video_prompt: A female figure's long, multi-toned hair dynamically swirls and flows as if underwater or in a strong breeze. Her powerful, direct gaze holds, subtly shifting focus or intensity. Dynamic lighting causes highlights and shadows to ripple and shift across her lustrous metallic armor. The abstract background continually morphs; soft, swirling mist textures gently drift on one side, as nebulous dark shapes emerge and recede on the other, evoking a changing deep space vista.
image_prompt: A close-up vertical portrait of a powerful futuristic female with an intense, unwavering gaze. She has ethereal, flowing ombré hair (platinum blonde to black), mid-parted, and smooth skin with prominent cheekbones, intense dark eyes with heavy eyeliner, and full parted lips. She wears form-fitting, lustrous metallic silver armor with intricate segmented organic designs, a high collar, and a sensual inner chest cut-out. Dramatic high-contrast lighting. Abstract, ethereal background of swirling white mist and dark nebulous shapes. Sci-fi, futuristic fantasy, epic, cinematic.
